text: Slavic folklore encompasses the folklore of the Slavic peoples from their earliest records until today. Folklorists have published a variety of works focused specifically on the topic over the years.See, for example, Kononenko 2007. ==See also== * Vladimir Propp, Russian folklorist who specialized in morphology * Supernatural beings in Slavic religion * Deities of Slavic religion ==Notes== ==References== *Kononenko, Natalie O. 2007. Slavic Folklore: A Handbook. Greenwood Press.
title: Slavic folklore
